title: The Little Art Den
tech: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS S3, Docker
info: A full stack app for art school students to showcase and sell their artworks.

title: Michelin Stars Finder
tech: Node, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Mongo Atlas
info: A full stack app that displays Michelin Star restaurants in Washington D.C. with their details and reviews.

title: Travel Safe
tech: React, fetch, CSS, Style Components, Travel Advisory API
info: A front end app to assess travel risk and advisories for all the countries which can help travelers to prepare their trips

title: Enchanted Rose
info: A unique version of the Hangman game inspired by Disney Beauty and the Beast.
